description: Number of permutations of length n by rises.
references: F. N. David, M. G. Kendall and D. E. Barton, Symmetric Function and Allied Tables, Cambridge, 1966, p. 264.
N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
mathematica: max = 22; s = Sum[k*k!*(x^2-x+k-1)*(-x*(x-1)/(x+1))^k, {k, 1, max+1}]/(x- x^2-x^3+x^4)^2 + O[x]^max; CoefficientList[s, x] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Feb 09 2016 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: Generating function from _Sean A. Irvine_, Nov 18 2010
